name: Schipax
description:
Reach to the end of each level by traveling dimensions!

Made in 48hs for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme "Duality".

Controls:

Arrow keys to move & R key to restart.

Credits:

Sebastian Salguero https://itch.io/profile/bastianarias373  - 3D art

Retsa  - Code / art

Bruno Riba https://itch.io/profile/hardcodedboy  - Code

Gabriel Iglesias https://churchegi.itch.io/  - Level Design / Music
